Name: Sherry Herbst
Ingredients: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
10 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Subtle vermouth and falernum sweetness takes the edge off this after-dinner whiskey charged, sipper of a cocktail.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in May 2017 at Soho House, Berlin, Germany. Herbst is the German word for autumn/fall and also refers to harvest time so this drink translates as Sherry Harvest.
